title: Johnstown Flood National Memorial: Learn About the Park
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park           Learn About the Park         Both Journey Around Lake Conemaugh and Path of the Flood Park Ranger led Van Tours are popular in the summer months. National Park Service.  Check out the 2016 Schedule of Events brochure for information about special park events like van tours, hikes, Clubhouse tours, and Saturday evening presentations. The South Fork Dam failed on Friday, May 31, 1889, causing the Great Johnstown Flood. The link will take you to a page with a detailed chronology of the dam. Hearing it from the people who actually lived it is one of the best ways to learn about the Johnstown Flood. Detailed information about the members of the South Fork Fishing & Hunting Club is available by clicking on this link. The Clubhouse of the South Fork Fishing & Hunting Club can be toured on Park Ranger led programs during the summer months.
